title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Pragmatism" by William James, Meridian Books", 1955
medium: Lithography in blue, green and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover vertically in green ink at lower right in script: lustig
On the top half of the cover in white and green letters: WILLIAM JAMES [white]/ PRAGMATISM [green]/ and four essays from The Meaning of Truth [white]
Across the bottom in green and blue: MERIDIAN BOOKS [green] published by The Noonday Press/ Sewn-bound for durability M16 $1.25 [blue]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket backgrounhd is a light green. The title and author are highlighted by blocks of blue, white and green. On the spine the title, author and publisher names are written vertically. On the back cover are the title, author name and synopsis of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Pragmatism" by William James, Meridian Books", 1955.Lithography in blue, green and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-185.
